hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #an Ice Trap#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# hoards #the Gerudo Card#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Wallet#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #final treasure of Ice Cavern# is #a Purple Rupee#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #Darunia's dance# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #the Lost Woods# is on the way of the hero.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that ##Jabu Jabu's Belly## has #1# major item.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #an Ice Trap#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: We don't make mistakes, we have happy accidents.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #the Lost Woods# is on the path to #Phantom Ganon#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #within the Spirit Trial#, chests contain...^ #a Heart Container# and #the Gerudo Mask#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Crystal Switch Chest
Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Invisible Chest

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that deep in the #wasteland a spider and a chest# hold...^ #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)# and #a Strength Upgrade#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #Ruto's Letter#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Red Rupee#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Wallet#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #village well# leads to #the Deku Tree#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is a foolish choice.

LH (Lab).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say Ganon's tail is vulnerable to nuts, arrows, swords, explosives, hammers...^...sticks, seeds, boomerangs...^...rods, shovels, iron balls, angry bees...

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #wooden walls# in the Shadow Temple hide...^ #an Ice Trap# and #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Spike Walls Left Chest

LW (Bridge).text: They say that plundering #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is a foolish choice.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #a Gold Skulltula Token# can be found at #Lon Lon Ranch#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that ##Hyrule Field## has #1# major item.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that deep #under a vast lake#, one can find #the Gerudo Training Ground#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #a Gold Skulltula Token# can be found in #Kokiri Forest#.
hinted_locations: KF GS Know It All House

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Red Rupee#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that paying a #fee to the Gerudos# grants access to #the Water Temple#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #Hyrule Field# is on the path to #Twinrova#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that slaying #20 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that Sheik dispelled the barrier around #Ganon's Tower#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# is on the way of the hero.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: Have you ever tried hammering the ground or wall in a room with Torch Slugs, Flare Dancers, Tektites, Walltulas, Scrubs or Deku Babas?
